spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Cornelius Watson is an 18th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 17}, {@hit 9} to hit with spell attacks). Cornelius Watson has the following wizard spells prepared:
footerEntries: * Divination spell of 1st level or higher.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Cornelius Watson has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Portent
entries: (Recharges after Cornelius Watson Casts a Divination Spell of 1st Level or Higher.) When Cornelius Watson or a creature he can see makes an attack roll, a saving throw, or an ability check, Cornelius Watson can roll a {@dice d20} and choose to use this roll in place of the attack roll, saving throw, or ability check.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.
